title: Statement from ONDCP Announcing Director Jim Carroll’s Upcoming Travel to China with Heads of CBP, USPIS – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
September 23, 2019
Office of National Drug Control PolicyOn Sunday, September 22, White House Office of National Drug Control Policy Director Jim Carroll will travel to Beijing to underscore the importance of keeping fentanyl and other synthetic opioids from coming into the United States. Director Carroll will lead a delegation that includes Acting Commissioner of Customs and Border Protection Mark Morgan and Chief Postal Inspector of the United States Postal Inspection Service Gary Barksdale.
